ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup peeled and cubed horseradish root

cookingTips: Wear gloves and work in a well-ventilated area as fresh horseradish releases pungent fumes
Process finely for creamier texture or leave chunkier for more bite
Store in refrigerator and use within a few weeks for best flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Warn the cook about horseradish's powerful properties and guide them through food processing to achieve desired consistency while managing vapors.
